title: Remove the Statues
author: VD
content_html:
In fairness to the orcs, the ancient kings of Gondor do appear to have been Literal Nazis.

Anyhow, I hope everyone will remember this Zero History phase of Clown World when the nationalists inevitably take over and the clowns are pleading for some little vestige of their rule to be preserved.

DISCUSS ON SG
